channel.description: Recent content in Time Series on SuJin's Portfolio

item.title: Altcoin Price Prediction Based on WQC Image Analysis
item.description:
ðŸ“Œ This project is a continuation of CIFAR-10 CNN Classification Practice, applying imageâ€‘based time series transformation techniques into financial forecasting using WQC.

ðŸ”— SERIES

  • 1. Quantile Correlation Analysis Tool Implementation
  • 2. MODWT-Based Time Series Transformation and Visualization
  • 3. CIFAR-10 CNN Classification Practice
  • 4. Altcoin Price Prediction Based on WQC Image Analysis

SUMMARY

As an undergraduate research project following “CIFAR-10 CNN Classification Practice”, I collected altcoin price data via the Binance API, generated WQC images (based on 256-hour sliding windows), and attempted price prediction using a CNN. This mini research project explores quantitative image-based forecasting techniques in crypto pricing.

item.title: MODWT-Based Time Series Transformation and Visualization
item.description:
ðŸ“Œ This project is a continuation of Quantile Correlation Analysis Tool Implementation, expanding on statistical modeling concepts introduced in the original research.

ðŸ”— SERIES

  • 1. Quantile Correlation Analysis Tool Implementation
  • 2. MODWT Time Series Transformation and Visualization
  • 3. CIFAR-10 CNN Classification Practice
  • 4. Altcoin Price Predicion Based on WQC Image Analysis

SUMMARY

This mini research project was conducted as a follow-up to the Quantile Correlation Analysis Tool Implementation. Based on concepts from the paper ,Testing the safe-haven properties of gold and bitcoin in the backdrop of COVID-19_A wavelet quantile correlation approach it explores the theory behind wavelet transformations and implements MODWT in Python.
